Html:
Hello,

I've just downloaded the WPF package and extracted it. It includes the necessary DLL's, and a Demo.WindowsPresentation application, but no sample projects, or documentation. Is the Demo application available in source form for download? I could not find it. It looks like a very capable control, but very challenging to get started with.

;] hey, usually sleep helps in such situations ;} check http://greatmaps.codeplex.com/SourceControl/list/changesets

p.s. Documentation is next to Discussions from the left

I wish I could blame it on lack of sleep. :)

Thank you for the assistance. I now have the source. I did see the Documentation page, but it's a bit thin.

Then I saw:

Documentation
is coming! ;}
 
and assumed that was all there is. I still haven't found anything beyond that so in a way I'm hoping that's all there is so you don't come back with another link, thereby confirming that I'm probably a moron. :))
